00046         enum PlaneSide
00047         {
00048             NO_SIDE,
00049             POSITIVE_SIDE,
00050             NEGATIVE_SIDE,
00051             BOTH_SIDE
00052         };
00063         template<typename T>
00064     class Plane
00065     {
00066     public:
00069         inline Plane ();

00072         inline Plane (const vector<3,T>& rkNormal, float fConstant);
00074                 inline Plane (float a, float b, float c, float d);

00106         inline float getDistance (const vector<3,T>& rkPoint) const;

00110             const vector<3,T>& rkPoint2);

00114 
00122                 inline vector<3,T> projectVector(const vector<3,T>& v) const;

00133         inline float normalise(void);
00134 
00135                 vector<3,T> normal;
00136         float d;
00137 
00139         bool operator==(const Plane<T>& rhs) const
00140         {
00141             return (rhs.d == d && rhs.normal == normal);
00142         }
00143         bool operator!=(const Plane<T>& rhs) const
00144         {
00145             return (rhs.d != d && rhs.normal != normal);
00146         }
00147     };

00149         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00150         template<typename T> inline
00151         Plane<T>::Plane ()
00152         {
00153                 normal = vector<3,T>::Zero();
00154                 d = 0.0;
00155         }
00156         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00157         template<typename T> inline
00158         Plane<T>::Plane (const Plane<T>& rhs)
00159         {
00160                 normal = rhs.normal;
00161                 d = rhs.d;
00162         }
00163         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00164         template<typename T> inline
00165         Plane<T>::Plane (const vector<3,T>& rkNormal, float fConstant)
00166         {
00167                 normal = rkNormal;
00168                 d = -fConstant;
00169         }
00170         //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00171         template<typename T> inline
00172         Plane<T>::Plane (float a, float b, float c, float _d)
00173                 : normal(a, b, c), d(_d)
00174         {
00175         }
00176         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00177         template<typename T> inline
00178         Plane<T>::Plane (const vector<3,T>& rkNormal, const vector<3,T>& rkPoint)
00179         {
00180                 redefine(rkNormal, rkPoint);
00181         }
00182         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00183         template<typename T> inline
00184         Plane<T>::Plane (const vector<3,T>& rkPoint0, const vector<3,T>& rkPoint1,
00185                 const vector<3,T>& rkPoint2)
00186         {
00187                 redefine(rkPoint0, rkPoint1, rkPoint2);
00188         }
00189         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00190         template<typename T> inline
00191         float Plane<T>::getDistance (const vector<3,T>& rkPoint) const
00192         {
00193                 return normal.dot(rkPoint) + d;
00194         }
00195         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00196         template<typename T> inline
00197         PlaneSide Plane<T>::getSide (const vector<3,T>& rkPoint) const
00198         {
00199                 float fDistance = getDistance(rkPoint);
00200 
00201                 if ( fDistance < 0.0 )
00202                         return Plane<T>::NEGATIVE_SIDE;
00203 
00204                 if ( fDistance > 0.0 )
00205                         return Plane<T>::POSITIVE_SIDE;
00206 
00207                 return Plane<T>::NO_SIDE;
00208         }
00209

00211         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00212 /*      template<typename T> inline
00213         typename Plane<T>::side Plane<T>::getSide (const AlignedBox3& box) const
00214         {
00215                 if (box.isNull()) 
00216                         return NO_SIDE;
00217                 if (box.isInfinite())
00218                         return BOTH_SIDE;
00219 
00220         return getSide(box.getCenter(), box.getHalfSize());
00221         }*/
00222     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00223         template<typename T> inline
00224     PlaneSide Plane<T>::getSide (const vector<3,T>& centre, const vector<3,T>& halfSize) const
00225     {
00226         // Calculate the distance between box centre and the plane
00227         float dist = getDistance(centre);
00228 
00229         // Calculate the maximise allows absolute distance for
00230         // the distance between box centre and plane
00231         float maxAbsDist = abs(normal.dot(halfSize));
00232 
00233         if (dist < -maxAbsDist)
00234             return Plane<T>::NEGATIVE_SIDE;
00235 
00236         if (dist > +maxAbsDist)
00237             return Plane<T>::POSITIVE_SIDE;
00238 
00239         return Plane<T>::BOTH_SIDE;
00240     }
00241         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00242         template<typename T> inline
00243         void Plane<T>::redefine(const vector<3,T>& rkPoint0, const vector<3,T>& rkPoint1,
00244                 const vector<3,T>& rkPoint2)
00245         {
00246                 vector<3,T> kEdge1 = rkPoint1 - rkPoint0;
00247                 vector<3,T> kEdge2 = rkPoint2 - rkPoint0;
00248                 normal = kEdge1.cross(kEdge2);
00249                 normal.normalize();
00250                 d = -normal.dot(rkPoint0);
00251         }
00252         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00253         template<typename T> inline
00254         void Plane<T>::redefine(const vector<3,T>& rkNormal, const vector<3,T>& rkPoint)
00255         {
00256                 normal = rkNormal;
00257                 d = -rkNormal.dot(rkPoint);
00258         }

00277         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00278         template<typename T> inline
00279     float Plane<T>::normalise(void)
00280     {
00281         float fLength = normal.length();
00282 
00283         // Will also work for zero-sized vectors, but will change nothing
00284         if (fLength > 1e-08f)
00285         {
00286             float fInvLength = 1.0f / fLength;
00287             normal *= fInvLength;
00288             d *= fInvLength;
00289         }
00290 
00291         return fLength;
00292     }
